radiographic_examinations.findings: Axillary, mediastinal, upper abdominal, retroperitoneal, and pelvic lymphadenopathy; no lesions in the liver, lung parenchyma, or adnexa.
A symmetric, gadolinium-enhancing mass (1.0 cm by 1.0 cm by 1.1 cm) at the base of the third ventricle, surrounding the infundibular recess.
